headline: Does Paycom (PAYC) Rehiring Former Sales Chief Reveal a Deeper Bet on Execution Consistency?
summary: Paycom Software has reappointed Jeff York as chief sales officer, effective January 23, 2026, with former CSO Amy Walker shifting into a consulting role after previously leading the sales organization. York’s return reunites Paycom with a sales leader whose prior tenure coincided with national recognition for the company’s sales force and rapid expansion. We’ll now examine how York’s return to the chief sales officer role reshapes Paycom’s investment narrative and long-term sales execution...
